Hello.

I am Sayantan Talukder (akritrime).

I am a full-stack software developer. I love building products and exploring new ideas. Currently, I am not actively looking for work but if you think I can help you with something, feel free to drop me a message on akritrime@gmail.com.

Currently, my favourite languages are Python and Rust. I also have experience in JavaScript, PHP and Ruby.

I also have experience with frontend frameworks like React and Vue, but lately I try to use just HTML/CSS/JS in my projects.
